modalContent.title: Real-Time Incident Response System
modalContent.description: An automated incident response system built with Amazon Connect that triggers escalation calls when alerts are received. The system uses AWS Lambda to orchestrate outbound calls, with automatic escalation to secondary contacts if the first contact doesn't respond. Features include call status monitoring, DynamoDB logging, and SNS integration for alert management.

modalContent.title: ShareShed: Library of Things
modalContent.description: A Brisbane-based 'Library of Things' platform enabling members to borrow useful items with an annual membership. Built as part of my DECO3801 course to replace limitations in the third-party system (downtime, limited customization, mobile access issues) with a responsive, role-based web app for customers and librarians/admins. Features include membership management, catalogue browsing, lending/returns, operating hours configuration, and an admin dashboard.
